verses.text_plain: A wise son heareth his father’s instruction: but a scorner heareth not rebuke.
verses.verse_html: 1A wise son heareth his father’s instruction: but a scorner heareth not rebuke.

verses.text_plain: A man shall eat good by the fruit of his mouth: but the soul of the transgressors shall eat violence.
verses.verse_html: 2A man shall eat good by the fruit of his mouth: but the soul of the transgressors shall eat violence.

verses.text_plain: He that keepeth his mouth keepeth his life: but he that openeth wide his lips shall have destruction.
verses.verse_html: 3He that keepeth his mouth keepeth his life: but he that openeth wide his lips shall have destruction.

verses.text_plain: The soul of the sluggard desireth, and hath nothing: but the soul of the diligent shall be made fat.
verses.verse_html: 4The soul of the sluggard desireth, and hath nothing: but the soul of the diligent shall be made fat.

verses.text_plain: A righteous man hateth lying: but a wicked man is loathsome, and cometh to shame.
verses.verse_html: 5A righteous man hateth lying: but a wicked man is loathsome, and cometh to shame.

verses.text_plain: Righteousness keepeth him that is upright in the way: but wickedness overthroweth the sinner.
verses.verse_html:
6Righteousness keepeth him that is upright in the way: but wickedness overthroweth the sinner. ▼
▼ the sinner: Heb. sin

footnotes.body_html: ▼ the sinner: Heb. sin

verses.text_plain: There is that maketh himself rich, yet hath nothing: there is that maketh himself poor, yet hath great riches.
verses.verse_html: 7There is that maketh himself rich, yet hath nothing: there is that maketh himself poor, yet hath great riches.

verses.text_plain: The ransom of a man’s life are his riches: but the poor heareth not rebuke.
verses.verse_html: 8The ransom of a man’s life are his riches: but the poor heareth not rebuke.

verses.text_plain: The light of the righteous rejoiceth: but the lamp of the wicked shall be put out.
verses.verse_html:
9The light of the righteous rejoiceth: but the lamp of the wicked shall be put out. ▼
▼ lamp: or, candle

verses.text_plain: Only by pride cometh contention: but with the well advised is wisdom.
verses.verse_html: 10Only by pride cometh contention: but with the well advised is wisdom.

verses.text_plain: Wealth gotten by vanity shall be diminished: but he that gathereth by labour shall increase.
verses.verse_html:
11Wealth gotten by vanity shall be diminished: but he that gathereth by labour shall increase. ▼
▼ by labour: Heb. with the hand

footnotes.body_text: ▼ by labour: Heb. with the hand
footnotes.body_html: ▼ by labour: Heb. with the hand

verses.text_plain: Hope deferred maketh the heart sick: but when the desire cometh, it is a tree of life.
verses.verse_html: 12Hope deferred maketh the heart sick: but when the desire cometh, it is a tree of life.

verses.text_plain: Whoso despiseth the word shall be destroyed: but he that feareth the commandment shall be rewarded.
verses.verse_html:
13Whoso despiseth the word shall be destroyed: but he that feareth the commandment shall be rewarded. ▼
▼ shall be rewarded: or, shall be in peace

footnotes.body_text: ▼ shall be rewarded: or, shall be in peace
footnotes.body_html: ▼ shall be rewarded: or, shall be in peace

verses.text_plain: The law of the wise is a fountain of life, to depart from the snares of death.
verses.verse_html: 14The law of the wise is a fountain of life, to depart from the snares of death.

verses.text_plain: Good understanding giveth favour: but the way of transgressors is hard.
verses.verse_html: 15Good understanding giveth favour: but the way of transgressors is hard.

verses.text_plain: Every prudent man dealeth with knowledge: but a fool layeth open his folly.
verses.verse_html:
16Every prudent man dealeth with knowledge: but a fool layeth open his folly. ▼
▼ layeth…: Heb. spreadeth

verses.text_plain: A wicked messenger falleth into mischief: but a faithful ambassador is health.
verses.verse_html:
17A wicked messenger falleth into mischief: but a faithful ambassador is health. ▼
▼ a faithful…: Heb. an ambassador of faithfulness

footnotes.body_text: ▼ a faithful…: Heb. an ambassador of faithfulness
footnotes.body_html: ▼ a faithful…: Heb. an ambassador of faithfulness

verses.text_plain: Poverty and shame shall be to him that refuseth instruction: but he that regardeth reproof shall be honoured.
verses.verse_html: 18Poverty and shame shall be to him that refuseth instruction: but he that regardeth reproof shall be honoured.

verses.text_plain: The desire accomplished is sweet to the soul: but it is abomination to fools to depart from evil.
verses.verse_html: 19The desire accomplished is sweet to the soul: but it is abomination to fools to depart from evil.

verses.text_plain: He that walketh with wise men shall be wise: but a companion of fools shall be destroyed.
verses.verse_html:
20He that walketh with wise men shall be wise: but a companion of fools shall be destroyed. ▼
▼ destroyed: Heb. broken

verses.text_plain: Evil pursueth sinners: but to the righteous good shall be repayed.
verses.verse_html: 21Evil pursueth sinners: but to the righteous good shall be repayed.

verses.text_plain: A good man leaveth an inheritance to his children’s children: and the wealth of the sinner is laid up for the just.
verses.verse_html: 22A good man leaveth an inheritance to his children’s children: and the wealth of the sinner is laid up for the just.

verses.text_plain: Much food is in the tillage of the poor: but there is that is destroyed for want of judgment.
verses.verse_html: 23Much food is in the tillage of the poor: but there is that is destroyed for want of judgment.

verses.text_plain: He that spareth his rod hateth his son: but he that loveth him chasteneth him betimes.
verses.verse_html: 24He that spareth his rod hateth his son: but he that loveth him chasteneth him betimes.

verses.text_plain: The righteous eateth to the satisfying of his soul: but the belly of the wicked shall want.
verses.verse_html: 25The righteous eateth to the satisfying of his soul: but the belly of the wicked shall want.
